author: HBO Max
description:
Join host Frankey Smith and Comic Correspondent Coy Jandreau for an action-packed broadcast straight from the DC booth at San Diego Comic-Con 2025 before they fly up to Eagly's Perch at PeaceFest. In this special episode of DC Studios Showcase, we bring you exclusive access to the con floor and the PeaceFest activation—featuring standout cosplay moments, surprise guest appearance and passionate conversations about the latest from Peacemaker, PeaceFest, and the evolving legacy of DC Comics at SDCC. Whether you're a long time fan or new to the DC Universe, this episode delivers insider perspectives, fan-favorite moments, and a celebration of the stories and characters that make Comic-Con the biggest pop culture event of the year. Watch new episodes of DC Studios Showcase every other Friday on HBO Max, HBO Max’s YouTube channel, and listen wherever you get your podcasts, including Spotify and Apple Podcasts. 

Guests:  
Juju Green 
Follow Juju: @straw_hat_goofy  

#SDCC2025 #SanDiegoComi
title: DC Studios Showcase Official Podcast | Episode 18: San Diego Comic-Con | HBO Max

author: HBO Max
description:
Autumn is here, and Carrie is writing her way through the pain inside her (finally) fully furnished apartment. Executive producers Michael Patrick King and Julie Rottenberg, along with co-executive producer Samantha Irby and executive story editor Rachel Palmer, dive into “Better Than Sex.” The writers discuss the significance of Duncan broaching the castle wall and coming upstairs. They also get into Herbert’s election woes, Brady’s bombshell reveal, and the making of that eyebrow-raising Giuseppe puppet.

About HBO Max:
HBO Max is the premier global streaming platform from Warner Bros. Discovery that delivers the most unique and captivating stories, ranging from the highest quality in scripted programming, movies, documentaries, true crime, adult animation, and live sports and news (where available). title: And Just Like That...The Writers Room Podcast Season 3 | Episode 10 | Max
